title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Digital Competency Development Program for Future Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can explain six strategies for integrating digital technology into lesson design: role modeling, reflection, instructional design, peer collaboration, authentic technology experiences, and continuous feedback
Participants can create at least three digital contents (quizzes, simulations, virtual labs) applicable to science classes (chemistry/biology) using smartphone-based tools
Participants can collaborate with peer teachers to develop digital technology-integrated lesson scenarios and incorporate real-time feedback
Participants can conduct at least two digital technology-applied teaching practicums per semester in real school settings and maintain reflective journals

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
